isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Luggage Compartment Lights W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper

svcproc.title: Luggage Compartment Lights W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper
svcproc.para: When the left luggage light switch is closed, power flows from battery stud B2 through circuit 14AP, fuse F8 - D, circuit 14AX, 14P, 14N, fuse L1, and circuit 63AA to the left luggage compartment light switch and lamp. If the right luggage compartment switch is also closed, power will also flow through circuit 63AA, and 63AD to the right luggage compartment light switch, and lamp. The ground path for the left light is 11N, and the ground path for the right light is 11K.
